messages.message:
Hey all, I have heard there are some problems w/ DB tests related to connection issues w/ the DB and other services:
• SQL databases
• Elastic (search-service tests)
• Azurite (file-service tests)
• CloudConsole (dynamo tests)
I made a configuration change that seems to help. If you have such problems: (1) pull (2) rebase, and (3) rerun.

If you still have problems, please send me a link to your failed build!

Ty all!
